<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Eidolon's Wrath](/Feats.aspx?ID=2911) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evolution" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=394" />
<trait label="Summoner" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=392" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 69 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your eidolon gains the [_eidolon's wrath_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1046) focus spell, which it casts, instead of you. You determine the damage type when you gain the feat: acid, cold, electricity, fire, negative, positive, or sonic. If your eidolon is a [celestial](/Traits.aspx?ID=23), [fiend](/Traits.aspx?ID=70), or [monitor](/Traits.aspx?ID=111) with an alignment other than true neutral, you can choose a damage type in its alignment. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1. As normal, your eidolon shares your Focus Points.
name: Eidolon's Wrath
